headline.main: Cuba’s Raul Castro Blasts Trump’s Mexican Wall and Trade Policy
headline.print_headline: Cuba’s Raul Castro Blasts Trump’s Mexican Wall and Trade Policy

lead_paragraph: Cuban President Raul Castro harshly criticized U.S. President Donald Trump's immigration, trade and other policies on Sunday as Trump reviews a fragile detente with Communist-run Cuba begun by his predecessor Barack Obama.
snippet: Cuban President Raul Castro harshly criticized U.S. President Donald Trump's immigration, trade and other policies on Sunday as Trump reviews a fragile detente with Communist-run Cuba begun by his predecessor Barack Obama....
